en: Our mission is to continue telling stories about this wonderful ecosystem so it can inspire and create awe in other people to want to protect nature, to want to relate to nature to want to immerse themselves in nature this is what we hope for people to remember that you are wild, that you are nature that this beautiful planet is your home that is really what we were trying to say in the film how wild places and wild animals are precious and that we all belong here, says Swati Thiyagarajan from the sea Change Project.

en: They include ANC veterans such as Benson Fihla, Nceba Faku and Litho Suka.
tsn: Mo go bona go akaretsa ba ba kileng ba lwa; jaaka Benson Fihla, Nceba le Litho Suka.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! The Setswana sentence "Mo go bona go akaretsa ba ba kileng ba lwa" translates to "I am going well, thank you very much" in English.

Here is the breakdown of the sentence:

* "Mo" means "I" or "me"
* "go" is the verb "to go"
* "bona" means "well"
* "go" is the verb "to go" again, used in the sense of "going well"
* "akaretsa" is the verb "to thank"
* "ba" is a preposition meaning "with" or "for"
* "kileng" means "very"
* "ba" is another preposition meaning "with" or "for"
* "lwa" is the word for "thank you"

So the entire sentence "Mo go bona go akaretsa ba ba kileng ba lwa" can be translated to "I am going well, thank you very much."</s>

en: My Lord we then perused these papers and we are hard at work drafting our answer on these papers we have formed an attitude that the state is ready to put the charges to the accused and between my Learned Friend and the state agree than they will then tender their plea formally in court both the accused I must also mention that we also agreed the application in term of 106 I H is voluminous with thousand pages with annexes we all agreed that the state needs time to answer by the way of affidavits.

llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is the translation of the Setswana sentence:

en: And until our demands are met, then well move away from here, says Mabija.

en: The provincial Department of Sports Arts and Culture says there are plans to meet the artists halfway.

en: Northern Cape Department of Sports, Arts and Culture Conrad Fortune says an amount of R4 million has been allocated.

In English, this translates to:

Please note that I have assumed that "Lefapha la Metshameko" refers to an account name or number, rather than a person. If this is not correct, please let me know and I will do my best to provide a more accurate translation.</s>

en: We are also in the process of developing a service level agreement which basically indicates how the funding will be utilised and remain in line with all the financial policies and acts of government when incurring expenses.

en: The artists say the departments delay to prioritise their demands is further compromising their already insufficient income.

Sure, I'd be happy to help! The Setswana sentence "Badiragatsi ba re lefapha le diega go rulaganya ditlhokego tsa bona mme le tswelela go tlhoka go duela, gajaana ga ba bone lotseno" can be translated to English as:

en: The cast of British royal drama The Crown took the top television prize for drama at the Screen Actors Guild (SAG) awards on Sunday while Schitts Creek, the story of a once-wealthy family forced to relocate to a small town, was named best television comedy.
tsn: Setlhopha sa terama ya Bogosi jwa kwa Britain, The Crown se tseile sekgele sa kwa godimo sa terama ya thelebišene kwa moletlong wa dikabelo wa Screen Actors Guild (SAG) ka LaTshipi, fa Schitts Creek, kanelo ya lelapa le lengwe le le neng le humile le pateletsega go fudugela kwa toropong e nnye, e kailwe go na kanelo ya metlae e e gaisang.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is the translation of the Setswana sentence:

"The Queen has been informed about the matter of the Screen Actors Guild (SAG) at Schitt's Creek, and she is not pleased with the way the actors have been treated."

Please note that I do not speak or understand Setswana, so if there are any errors in the translation, please let me know and I will do my best to correct them.</s>

en: Gillian Anderson, who plays British Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher in The Crown, which focused its most recent season on the troubled marriage of Prince Charles and Princess Diana, also picked up best actress award.
tsn: Gillian Anderson, yo o tshamekang karolo ya Tonakgolo ya  Borithane Margaret Thatcher mo go The Crown, e, e e neng e lebagane le setlha sa sešweng  sa mathata mo lenyalo la ga Kgosana Charles le Kgosigadi Diana, o tseile sekgele sa modiragatsi wa mosadi yo o  gaisang.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is the translation of the Setswana sentence:

"Gillian Anderson, who played the role of Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher in The Crown, has revealed that she was not aware of the controversial storyline involving Prince Charles and Princess Diana, which was kept secret until the show was released."

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: Heavy is the head that wears The Crown  Congratulations to this amazing ensemble!

Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Setswana sentence:

en: Due to the coronavirus pandemic, 2021’s SAG ceremony was scaled down from a gala dinner to a one-hour presentation, held remotely, and peppered with jokes about how actors filled their free time during lockdown or got a start in their careers.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya leroborobo la mogare wa corona, moletlo wa SAG wa 2021 o fokoditswe go tloga go moletlo wa dijo tsa maitseboa go ya go ura e nngwe ya tlhagiso, a latlhela metlae ka ga ka moo badiragatsi ba dirisitseng nako ya bona ka teng ka nako ya thibelomotsamao kgotsa go simolola ka dithuto tsa bokamoso.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is the translation of the Setswana sentence you provided:

"The coronavirus pandemic has caused great suffering and hardship, especially among the elderly and those with underlying health conditions. Many people have lost their jobs and sources of income, leaving them struggling to make ends meet."

I hope this helps! Please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: On the film side, courtroom drama The Trial of the Chicago 7 and jazz period film Ma Rainey’s Black Bottom were the big winners at one of the last major ceremonies before the Oscars.

llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Setswana sentence:

"The Trial of the Chicago 7 is a film about the music of Black Bottom in the time of Ma Rainey, and it has been nominated for several Oscars."

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.</s>

en: The SAG awards are chosen by members of the acting union.

en: Many of the SAG winners and nominees are also up for honours at the British BAFTA awards next week and the Independent Spirit Awards on 22 April.

en: Godzilla vs. Kong muscled its way to a pandemic-era box office record, giving Hollywood studios and theatre owners alike hope that people are ready to return to the movies after a year of watching Netflix at home.

llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Setswana sentence:

"Godzilla versus Kong is expected to dominate the box office, but it will face stiff competition from other big-budget movies produced by Hollywood giants like Netflix."

en: The Presiding Officer of the Methodist Church, Bishop Purity Malinga, says the availability of vaccines against the coronavirus is a sign of hope and one of the good news stories to tell this Easter.
tsn: Moreetsa-kgetse wa Kereke ya Methodist, Mobishopomogolo Purity Malinga, a re go nna teng ga meento e e kgatlhanong le corona ke letshwao le tsholofelo mme nngwe ya dikgang tse di monate ke go bolela ka se ka Paseka.
llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's the translation of the Setswana sentence:

"The Rev. Moreetsa-Kgetse Wa Kereke of the Methodist Church, Mrs. Purity Malinga, is asking for your prayers for her as she prepares to preach the word of God with purity and humility, just like the Virgin Mary, who was chosen by God to bear His son."

I hope that helps! If you have any other questions or requests, please feel free to ask.</s>

en: Bishop Malinga was delivering the sermon during a virtual Easter Sunday Service broadcast on SABC 2, hosted by the South African Council of Churches (SACC) and its member churches.

Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is the translation of the Setswana sentence:

Sure, I'd be happy to help! The Setswana sentence "Mobishopo o rile kwa ga bontsho jo naga ya rona e lebaganeng le jona, go na le tsholofelo" can be translated to English as:

en: We have seen the darkness of corruption, Gender-Based Violence, poverty, hunger; the list goes on.

The Setswana sentence "Re bone bontsho jwa bobodu, tirisodikgoka e e ikaegileng ka bong, lehuma, tlala; lenane le tswelela pele" translates to "If you have a big heart, you will find joy in helping others, even if it means sacrificing your own time and energy."</s>

en: As Easter people, we do not despair; we do not lose hope.

en: The database appears to be the same set of Facebook-linked telephone numbers that has been circulating in hacker circles since January and whose existence was first reported by tech publication Motherboard, according to Alon Gal, co-founder of Israeli cybercrime intelligence firm Hudson Rock.

en: The convoy will transport 18 kings and four queens, mostly from the New Kingdom, from the Egyptian Museum in central Cairos Tahrir Square to the National Museum of Egyptian Civilization in Fustat, about 5km (3 miles) to the south-east.

llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is the translation of the Setswana sentence:

"The train will depart from platform 18 at 18:00 for New Kingdom, via Musiame in Egypt, through Tahrir Square in Cairo, and then continue on to the ancient city of Fustat, covering a distance of 5 kilometers (3 miles)."

en: And in that moment that of crying out, it’s a reminder to those who cry out as they face their own death through the COVID-19 pandemic, the 52000 or so people who have lost their lives in this nation and they have lost their lives almost alone.

Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here is the translation of the Setswana sentence:

llama:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! The Setswana sentence "Fela re batla go gakolola wena jaaka leloko la lelapa la bona, gore ga ba leba seno ba le esi gonne Modimo ono o nnile le maitemogelo a bodutu jwa loso mme a lela, go reng o ntlogetse?" can be translated to English as:

en: President Cyril Ramaphosa last night announced that the sale of alcohol for off-site consumption is prohibited from this Friday to next Monday but alcohol will still be sold for onsite consumption at restaurants, bars and taverns.
